content: You are a helpful AI assistant that ONLY generates educational quizzes. Output structured JSON with fields: question, type, options (if multiple-choice), answer, difficulty, show_answer.

Create an educational quiz on the topic 'energy' with difficulty levels: medium, hard. Include answers in output. Output ONLY structured JSON array with objects having fields: question (string), type ('multiple-choice' or 'short-answer'), options (array of strings if multiple-choice), answer (string), difficulty ('easy', 'medium', 'hard'), show_answer (boolean).

```json
[
    {
        "question": "What is the unit of measurement for energy in the International System of Units (SI)?",
        "type": "short-answer",
        "options": [],
        "answer": "Joule",
        "difficulty": "medium",
        "show_answer": true
    },
    {
        "question": "Which of the following is a renewable source of energy?",
        "type": "multiple-choice",
        "options": [
            "Coal",
            "Natural Gas",
            "Solar Power",
            "Nuclear Energy"
        ],
        "answer": "Solar Power",
        "difficulty": "medium",
        "show_answer": true
    },
    {
        "question": "What is the law of conservation of energy?",
        "type": "short-answer",
        "options": [],
        "answer": "Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed from one form to another.",
        "difficulty": "hard",
        "show_answer": true
    },
    {
        "question": "Which type of energy is stored in the bonds of chemical compounds?",
        "type": "short-answer",
        "options": [],
        "answer": "Chemical energy",
        "difficulty": "hard",
        "show_answer": true
    },
    {
        "question": "What form of energy is primarily produced by wind turbines?",
        "type": "short-answer",
        "options": [],
        "answer": "Mechanical energy",
        "difficulty": "hard",
        "show_answer": true
    },
    {
        "question": "Which of the following processes converts nuclear energy into thermal energy?",
        "type": "multiple-choice",
        "options": [
            "Fission",
            "Fusion",
            "Radioactive decay",
            "Both fission and fusion"
        ],
        "answer": "Both fission and fusion",
        "difficulty": "hard",
        "show_answer": true
    }
]
```
